name: Hawk 51
description:
Hawk 51, is an action adventure game with an '80s horror twist.

You play as H. "Hawk" Hawkins, an up and coming Canadian author on his way to a book signing in Las Vegas,  Nevada when his car breaks down just outside of the infamous Area 51. Little does he know that thirsty green alien women want him to "clap their cheeks".  With the aid of a dog companion, will Hawk rid the earth of these degenerate thirsty aliens? 

The game makes an homage to '80s horror classics and John Carpenter's films.

This game was made in about three weeks for a game jam, hope you have fun and please report any bugs!

Keep the folders contents together so you can save!

Arrow Keys = Move

Z/SPACEBAR/ENTER = Advance text; make selections; Melee/Knife attack

X /ESC= Pause/Menu

A = Ranged Weapon/Tool

S = Heal

D = Block
